comment: Smart Data Models - GovHydro1 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovHydro1/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Basic Hydro turbine governor model.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: at
contents.comment: Turbine gain (At) (>0).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dturb
contents.comment: Turbine damping factor (Dturb) (>=0).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmax
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening (Gmax) (>0).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmin
contents.comment: Minimum gate opening (Gmin) (>=0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: hdam
contents.comment: Turbine nominal head (hdam).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: qnl
contents.comment: No-load flow at nominal head (qnl) (>=0).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rperm
contents.comment: Permanent droop (R) (>0).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rtemp
contents.comment: Temporary droop (r) (>R).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Filter time constant () (>0).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: tg
contents.comment: Gate servo time constant (Tg) (>0).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: tr
contents.comment: Washout time constant (Tr) (>0).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

contents.name: tw
contents.comment: Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: velm
contents.comment: Maximum gate velocity (Vlem) (>0).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
